publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2935 Shiona Baird: National Youth Parliament Competition—That the Parliament congratulates Montrose Academy on winning the National Youth Parliament Competition 2005; commends the hard work of the staff and the pupils in conducting an impressive debate on a Bill to promote alternative forms of energy to preserve the environment of Scotland; congratulates the school on its continuing involvement in this worthwhile project which encourages young people to engage with the parliamentary process, and congratulates Belmont Academy, Ayr, as runners up and Catherine Lovegrove from Morrison’s Academy, Crieff, as Best Minister.

S2M-2935 National Youth Parliament Competition (lodged on 8 June 2005) Mark Ballard*, Elaine Smith*, Robin Harper*, Bruce Crawford*, Fiona Hyslop*, Patrick Harvie*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Marlyn Glen*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Ms Sandra White*, Eleanor Scott*, Mrs Nanette Milne*

S2M-2935 Shiona Baird: National Youth Parliament Competition—That the Parliament congratulates Montrose Academy on winning the National Youth Parliament Competition 2005; commends the hard work of the staff and the pupils in conducting an impressive debate on a Bill to promote alternative forms of energy to preserve the environment of Scotland; congratulates the school on its continuing involvement in this worthwhile project which encourages young people to engage with the parliamentary process, and congratulates Belmont Academy, Ayr, as runners up and Catherine Lovegrove from Morrison’s Academy, Crieff, as Best Minister. Supported by: Mark Ballard, Elaine Smith, Robin Harper, Bruce Crawford, Fiona Hyslop, Patrick Harvie, Mr Jamie Stone, Marlyn Glen, Roseanna Cunningham, Ms Sandra White, Eleanor Scott, Mrs Nanette Milne, Chris Ballance*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-2935 National Youth Parliament Competition (lodged on 8 June 2005) Christine Grahame*, Trish Godman*
S2M-2935 National Youth Parliament Competition (lodged on 8 June 2005) Tommy Sheridan*, Mary Scanlon*, Frances Curran*
S2M-2935 National Youth Parliament Competition (lodged on 8 June 2005) Richard Lochhead*, Dr Jean Turner*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-2935 National Youth Parliament Competition (lodged on 8 June 2005) Cathy Peattie*, John Swinburne*
S2M-2935 National Youth Parliament Competition (lodged on 8 June 2005) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
